name: Boryslav
startIntroPart1: You stand on the land where oil flows from the ground
startIntroPart2: Ihor Yavorskyi, Boryslav once was a thriving city, can you bring back the glory it held and defend this land from envious invaders?
declaringWar: Let's see whose side will gods take.
attacked: You think you have a chance?
defeated: Can't believe I am defeated, you are no ordinary leader!
introduction: Greetings, i hope we will get along.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was tiresome
tradeRequest: I hope you will agree to my offer
